Interface ReplenishmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryManagement
public interface ReplenishmentService
The ReplenishmentService interface provides methods for managing inventory replenishment.

This interface includes methods for submitting replenishment requests, updating stock thresholds, and restocking items either by item name or by specific replenishment request IDs. Implementations of this interface should handle the inventory update process and manage stock quantities based on these operations.

This interface is designed to support systems that require inventory control and restocking to maintain stock levels.

Since:
2024-11-5
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sia Yi Zhen

  • Method Details

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      void submitReplenishmentRequest(String itemName, int quantity, String requestedBy)
      Submits a new replenishment request for an item. This request includes the item name, quantity requested, and the ID of the individual who made the request. The request is initially set to "Pending" status.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to be replenished.
      quantity - The quantity requested for replenishment.
      requestedBy - The ID of the person submitting the replenishment request.

    • updateLowStockThreshold

      void updateLowStockThreshold(String itemName, int newThreshold)
      Updates the low stock threshold for a specific item in the inventory. This threshold determines when an item is considered low on stock.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item for which the low stock threshold is to be updated.
      newThreshold - The new low stock threshold quantity for the item.

    • restockItemByName

      boolean restockItemByName(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Restocks an item by the specified quantity. This method directly increases the current stock of an item by the given quantity.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the item to be restocked.
      quantity - The quantity to add to the current stock level.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully restocked; false if the item was not found in the inventory.

    • restockItemByRequestID

      boolean restockItemByRequestID(String requestID, String approvedBy)
      Approves a replenishment request based on the unique request ID and updates the inventory. The requestâ€™s status is changed to "Approved," and the approval is recorded with the approving individual's ID.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The unique identifier of the replenishment request.
      approvedBy - The ID of the individual approving the request.
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully processed; false if the request was not found or has already been processed.
